member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources
member.summary: Defines constants that identify external resources used in tests.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources
member.summary: Defines constants that identity Windows Azure resources.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.AzureAuthorityServer
member.summary: The address of the Azure Active Directory that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.ClassicTableStorageConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string to the classic table storage that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.CosmosDbTableStorageConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string to the CosmosDb table storage that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.KeyVaultUrl
member.summary: The URL of the Key Value that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.KeyVaultSecretName
member.summary: The name of one secret stored in the key vault that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.KeyVaultKeyName
member.summary: The name of one key stored in the key vault that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.KeyVaultCertificateName
member.summary: The name of one certificate stored in the key vault that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.KeyVaultClientApplicationId
member.summary: The application id of the client application that is being used to communicate with the key vault used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.KeyVaultClientApplicationKey
member.summary: The application key of the client application that is being used to communicate with the key vault used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.KeyVaultResourceName
member.summary: The name of the resource (OAuth) to access the KeyVault that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.AppInsightsInstrumentationKey
member.summary: The instrumentation key for the Application Insights that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.RedisCacheConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string to the REDIS cache that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.SearchServiceName
member.summary: The name of the Azure Search service used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.SearchServiceApiKey
member.summary: The API key of the Azure Search service used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.ServiceBusConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string to the service Bus instance that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.ServiceBusPath
member.summary: The service bus instance path (i.e. topic) that should be used in publish-subscribe tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.ServiceBusSubscription1
member.summary: The service bus instance subscription that should be used in publish-subscribe tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.ServiceBusSubscription2
member.summary: The service bus instance subscription that should be used in publish-subscribe tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.CosmosDbConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string to the CosmosDb instance that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AzureResources.AzureAppConfigurationConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string to the Azure AppConfiguration instance that should be used in tests.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AuthorityServers
member.summary: Defines constants that identity authority servers.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AuthorityServers.IdentityServerProduction
member.summary: The base address of Identity Server (production) (HTTPS).

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.AuthorityServers.IdentityServerStaging
member.summary: The base address of Identity Server (staging) (HTTP).

member.summary: The SMTP server user name.
